name: Your Custom Sock
description: Purchase this item and we will produce a custom Nike Elite sock for you. After purchase, you can email us what you would like designed and any images you would like included. These are true customs made exclusively for you. We would like to get a measurement from you from underneath each heel (right and left) to the bottom of your knee as pictured below. This helps us determine alignment of texts, etc that will go on to the elite. We will create the image that will go on the sock. If it is what you want, we'll make your socks and ship them to you. If we can't put something together that you like, we'll refund your money. GUARANTEED! Once the socks ship, we can't accept refunds since this is custom merchandise. We are quick to respond. You'll typically hear back from is in less than a day. We'll have a preliminary design for your review within two days. We are busy but we have time for you. Whether you want one pair of socks for a special event or to match your shoes OR you have a sports team and need a hundred socks, we have a custom design for you! Typically we can ship socks in less than a week. We ship through the postal service -- and we do ship internationally. If you want your customs quicker, we can UPS or FedEx and charge you the difference in shipping with the postal service. If you have an image you want to use, please make sure that you own it or have the right to use it. We can't reproduce copyrighted logos and images unless you are the owner or have permission. If you are on a team, we would be happy to work with you and provide team discounts if we are allowed to use your logo. If you want us to put Michael Jordan or Lebron James on a sock, we just can't do it. We are inspired by these players -- we also respect that their image is used only how they want it to be used. If you want something cool and custom just for you, we can do it. We will work with any size sock and any type of sock that matches our artistic process. Let us know what you want! For samples, see our Instagram at http://instagram.com/thesickestsocks

name: Under Armour Shooter Sleeve (one sleeve)
description:
Customize your own Sleeve
Email us please after your purchase and we will get right back to you within 24 hours to start your customization.


Dominate the hardwood when you put on the Under Armour® Men's Shooter Sleeve. The ultratight compression sleeve boosts arm-muscle performance by increasing blood circulation. The sleeve offers full arm coverage to protect against cuts and bruising. HeatGear® technology helps keep you dry, cool and light in hot temperatures. Heat-sealed UA logo.
Features and Benefits

- HeatGear® material wicks sweat away quickly to help keep you cool, dry and light in high temperatures
- Ultratight compression sleeve helps increase circulation to boost arm-muscle performance
- Full arm coverage protects against cuts and abrasions
- Superior Moisture Transport System wicks away sweat to keep you dry
- Heat-sealed UA logo
- Machine wash cold with like colors, do not use bleach, fabric softeners or dryer sheets; tumble dry on low heat, do not iron

name: The Nike Dri-Fit Forearm Shivers
description:
The Nike Dri-Fit Forearm Shivers are form-fitting sleeves constructed of Nike Dri-Fit fabric that will protect your arms from cuts and abrasions while playing football and other sports. Dri-Fit fabric wicks moisture away from your skin to keep you cool and dry. One size fits all and sold in pairs. Save your arms from turf burns when diving for a catch or making a tackle. 
Nike Forearm Sleeve Features: 
Nike Dri Fit fabric - Wick moisture to keep athlete cool and dry 
Form fitting sleeves protect forearms from cuts and abrasions 
Heat seal swoosh logo 
•	Sold in pairs 
•	Fabric: 64% Nylon, 13% Spandex, 14% Rubber, 9% Polyester 
•	One size fits all

Hand wash is recommended for washing and lay flat to dry.

DIRECTIONS FOR ORDERING; 
As soon as payment is made for the item, we will be in contact with you that day. We will work on a preview that we will have for the cap within that day to work out designs and your ideas on the sleeves. Feel free to email us at thesickestsocks@gmail.com. 
Lastly once the item is purchased, we will help you customize until you are happy with the designs and customizations. Once you are, we will print the sleeves and ship to you 2 day tracking USPS with delivery confirmation. We appreciate all payment up front. Our work is guaranteed and with our artists 19 + years experience in graphic art; we are sure you will be satisfied. 
The customization of these sleeves are primarily for the teams' use. 
Not for sale for the public unless you aren't using the team players' designs.
